title: I wish to buy a tablet for taking notes using a stylus for a budget of ₹ 25,000 to ₹ 30,000. What are some good options? - Quora

response.answer_text: Go for ipad 2019. When talking about tablets, there’s nothing better than iPad.. It costs around 30k. If your budget matches it, go for it.. Otherwise you can also buy iPad 2018 at a discounted price .. There’s not much of a difference in both other than screen real state. My two roommates, one have iPad 2018, other have iPad 2019.. So I’ve seen both, they’ll be the best option for notes taking and educational purposes..
